#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
#include<math.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t,i,count;
	double a,b,c;
	double d,k;
	cin>>t;
	scanf("%lf %lf %lf",&a,&b,&c);
	d=sqrt(a*a+b*b+c*c);
	count = 0;
	for(i=0;i<t;i++)
	{
		scanf("%lf",&k);
		if(k <= d)
			count++;
	}
	printf("%d\n",count);	
	return 0;
}
